project.name: Sideshow
project.description: An incredible Javascript interactive help Library

SSException.name: SSException
SSException.description: A custom exception class for Sideshow

CloseButton.name: CloseButton
CloseButton.description: The close button for the wizard

Polling.name: Polling
Polling.description: Controls the polling functions needed by Sideshow

Screen.name: Screen
Screen.description: Represents the current available area in the browser

FadableItem.name: FadableItem
FadableItem.description: A visual item which holds fading in and out capabilities

HidableItem.name: HidableItem
HidableItem.description: A visual item which can be shown and hidden

CompositeMask.name: CompositeMask
CompositeMask.description: Controls the mask surrounds the subject (the step focussed area)

CornerPart.name: CornerPart
CornerPart.description: A corner part composing the mask

Mask.SubjectMask.name: Mask.SubjectMask
Mask.SubjectMask.description: Controls the mask that covers the subject during a step transition

Mask.Arrow.name: Mask.Arrow
Mask.Arrow.description: A single arrow for pointing individual items in current subject

Mask.Arrows.name: Mask.Arrows
Mask.Arrows.description: Class representing all the current shown arrows

Mask.StepDescription.name: Mask.StepDescription
Mask.StepDescription.description: Represents a panel holding the step description

Mask.DetailsPanel.name: Mask.DetailsPanel
Mask.DetailsPanel.description: The panel that holds step description, is positionated over the biggest remaining space among the four parts of a composite mask

Mask.Subject.name: Mask.Subject
Mask.Subject.description: The current subject (the object being shown by the current wizard)

Mask.ControlVariables.name: Mask.ControlVariables
Mask.ControlVariables.description: Stores the variables used in step evaluators

Mask.WizardMenu.name: Mask.WizardMenu
Mask.WizardMenu.description: The main menu, where the available wizards are listed

params.name: config
params.description: Dimension, positioning and border radius information

classitems.description: A function to prepare the environment for running a wizard (e.g. redirecting to some screen)
An object with listeners to this wizard (e.g. beforeWizardStarts, afterWizardEnds)
A configuration flag that defines if the step position (e.g. 2/10, 3/15, 12/12) will be shown
An array with related wizards names. These wizards are listed after the ending of the current wizard.
The wizard unique name (used internally as an identifier)
The wizard title (will be shown in the list of available wizards)
The wizard description (will be shown in the list of available wizards)
The wizard estimated completion time (will be shown in the list of available wizards)
A collection of rules to infer whether a wizard should be available in a specific screen
The sequence of steps for this wizard
Points to the current step object in a playing wizard
Sets the storyline for the wizard
classitems.name: storyLine

classitems.description: Runs the wizard
classitems.name: play

classitems.description: Shows a specific step
classitems.name: showStep

params.name: callback
params.description: A callback function to be called

classitems.description: Shows the next step of the wizard
classitems.name: next

params.name: callback
params.description: A callback function to be called

classitems.description: Hides the step
classitems.name: hideStep

params.name: callback
params.description: A callback function to be called in the ending of the hiding process

classitems.description: Returns the position of the step passed as argument or (by default) the current step
classitems.name: getStepPosition

params.name: step
params.description: The step object to get position

classitems.description: Checks if a wizard should be shown in the current context (running each evaluator defined for this wizard)
classitems.name: isEligible

return.description: A boolean indicating if this wizard should be available in the current context

classitems.description: Checks if the current user already watched this wizard
classitems.name: isAlreadyWatched

return.description: A boolean indicating if the user watched this wizard

classitems.description: A Polling function to check if the current step is completed
classitems.name: pollForCheckCompletedStep

classitems.description: Sets a variable value
classitems.name: set

return.description: A formatted key=value pair representing the defined variable

classitems.description: Sets a variable if not defined yet
classitems.name: setIfUndefined

return.description: A formatted key=value pair representing the defined variable

classitems.description: Checks if some variable is already defined
classitems.name: isDefined

return.description: A boolean indicating if the variable is already defined

classitems.description: Gets a variable value
classitems.name: get

classitems.description: Gets a pair with name and value
classitems.name: getNameValuePair

return.description: A pair with the variable name and value

classitems.description: Remove some variable from the control variables collection
classitems.name: remove

return.description: A pair with the removed variable name and value

classitems.description: Clear the control variables collection
classitems.name: clear

classitems.description: Renders the wizard menu
classitems.name: render

classitems.description: Shows the wizard menu
classitems.name: show

classitems.description: Hides the wizard menu
classitems.name: hide

params.name: callback
params.description: The callback to be called after hiding the menu
